reason.html: Tests not working yet. I'll be back when ready.

description.raw:
`Node::Advertise()`, `Node::Subscribe()` and `Node::Request()` require a function callback. The suported function callbacks are free functions and member functions. This pull request removes the code duplication between the two versions of `Node::Advertise()`, `Node::Subscribe()` and `Node::Request()`.

It also includes a `void*` casting when populating the array of zmq::pollitem_t for zmq4.1.x compatibility (used in Mac OS X).

Thanks to @dirk-thomas for his help in this pull request.

CI results:

* [Ubuntu trusty](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/ignition_transport/job/ignition_transport-any-devel-trusty-amd64/19/) is pending.
* [Mac OS X](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/ignition_transport/job/ignition_transport-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/26/) is pending.
* [Windows](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/ignition_transport/job/ignition_transport-any-devel-windows7-amd64/39/) is pending.
